page.title: 11CLUBS CHURCH
page.content: {The Young Wives}and{Mothers Union}are a combined organisation attached to All Saints Church Sheepy Magna and their meetings are held on the first Wednesday of every month at the Rectory. They have a membership of about 15. {Open House}is a well supported self help group attached to All Saints Church Sheepy Magna. Their meetings are held on the third Monday of the month in members homes. The aim is fellowship and it's members offer transport and general help to those in need. The{Holiday Bible Club}is he annually for the children of the village and lasts for two weeks in July.Events are organised for the children by the Rector and friends of the church.
